title: Getting deranked from Platinum. (PLEASE ANSWER)
body: How would you know if you are close to deranking, I am currently plat 5 with normal MMR, I got to 70lp and lost back to 0lp. I'm scared if i am going to derank or not.

replies.body:
If your MMR drops below the MMR of those in your division, you'll be in danger of being demoted. Losing a game at 0 LP won't necessarily mean an instant demotion, but it certainly doesn't bode well if you're at 0 and hit a losing streak.

Check out our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) for more details on how the system works. Let me know if you have any questions.
So what do you mean by that, if I'm at gold 1-3 MMR does it mean I'm going to be demoted? Or is it when you're in g5 mmr or silver 1
We don't have that information to share, but if you have any other questions, let me know.

From my understanding, the only way you can demote from a tier is if your MMR is two tiers below your div, so if you are plat 5, 0 LP and your MMR hits silver level.  Gold 5 0 LP and bronze MMR,  Silver 5 0 LP and very low bronze MMR and so forth.

Edit:  You can also decay out of the tier too if you are inactive.

Yes, but when your anything above gold, you rank decays over time a certain rates, if you don't play ranked matches, and because you're in plat, if you don't play for long enough, which is what I'm assuming happened, your rank decayed.
